Comment 7: 
How about this?

diff -r 9d0f388bbe40 src/pkg/net/http/transport.go
--- a/src/pkg/net/http/transport.go	Mon Jan 06 01:34:56 2014 +1100
+++ b/src/pkg/net/http/transport.go	Tue Jan 07 20:28:49 2014 +0900
@@ -261,6 +261,9 @@
 		if err != nil {
 			return nil, err
 		}
+		if cm.proxyURL == nil {
+			t.Proxy = nil
+		}
 	}
 	return cm, nil
 }
